tag_professor: Caring (3)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
stu_tags: EXTRA CREDIT  CARING  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: Easy A because she\'s an easy grader, but doesn\'t teach very well. Only counts the best 5/10 quizzes towards your grade and offers extra credit. She doesn\'t work through problems or offer help, she tells you to ask a neighbor but sucks if they don\'t understand either. She did write the entire class a letter of rec though, so she is super caring!

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Amazing class highly recommend to take her class if you are interested to learn a little of everything about math such as statistics, scientific notation, and much more. There is only a midterm and a final. Her explanations are very well detailed and full explained. If I could have her again as my professor I would without a doubt.

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Professor Mason was the BEST math teacher I have ever had and I am so grateful to have taken her class. I hope that she will teach other Math classes that I need to take. She is really there for her students and you can tell that she likes teaching. Also, a very good teacher if you are a visual learner.

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Vanessa Mason is an AMAZING professor. This is my 3rd year and she is probably my favorite professor at csueb. I\'m not the brightest in math but she really made it easy to understand and is so interested in helping her students without a doubt. She was so kind to bring snacks during some classes. Its hard to find profs at eb that is willing as her

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: One of the best professors! She makes stats understandable! Allows notes/book/hw for exams. Homework is difficult, but she will help you if you ask. Definately take her!

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Extremely helpful. Lectures can be dry- but it IS statistics after all. Assigns A LOT of homework, but you can chose your questions. Allows ANY notes and handouts on midterms/finals. She even brings us snacks since the class runs from 6:30 until 8:20- when most of us would be eating dinner. Wonderfully nice woman, would take again.

tag_professor: Caring (3)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: She is so helpful with whatever you have questions with. She also responds promptly to e-mails when needing help outside the classroom. She goes through each step one at a time to make sure everyone understands. She even brings snacks to class! That\'s a bonus!
